def process(N, X, Y, Z):
    for i in xrange(99,9,-1):
        I = (i/10)*10000+X*1000+Y*100+Z*10+(i%10)
        if  I % N == 0:
            return ' '.join(map(str, (i/10, i%10, I / N)))
    return 0

def main():
    T = int(raw_input())
    for t in xrange(T):
        N = int(raw_input())
        X, Y, Z = map(int, raw_input().split())
        print process(N, X, Y, Z)

main()
